wxSkinChooser Class Reference

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 wxSkinChooser (wxWindow *parent, const wxString &dirname, const wxString mask, const wxString application=wxEmptyString)

Detailed Description

This is a simple dialog to alow easy switching of skins.

wxSkinChooser allows a user to switch between skins at runtime. Simply create it and do a ShowModal().

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

wxSkinChooser::wxSkinChooser ( wxWindow *  parent,
const wxString &  dirname,
const wxString  mask,
const wxString  application = wxEmptyString 
)

Create the chooser dialog and load available skin file info

Parameters:
parent the parent window
dirname a valid directory to scan for skin files
mask a file mask to search for (skin*.zip)
application (optional) set this to only show skins that match this string in their application property
